name: CruxFlaw
description:
Throw, Slash, Dash! Cruxflaw is an arena score attack game in which you have to manage your use of your stun orb to effectively to survive as long as possible. Manage your resources by throwing it to stun enemies, then predict where it will travel to pick it up and refresh your dashes.

Rack up eliminations in quick succession to earn a score multiplier, be sure to keep it going!

Gameplay

  • Carrying your stun orb increases your movement speed to reposition yourself.
  • Throwing your orb allows you to stun enemies, making them vunerable to attack.
  • When you are not carrying your orb, you can dash twice and attack but move much slower.
  • Bounce the orb off enemies, walls or redirect it's movement by slashing it
  • Picking up the orb replenishes your dashes.

Features

  • Diverse arenas to unlock
  • Medals per level based on score
  • A variety of different enemy types and obstacles to mix up gameplay
